content.rendered:
Directed by Tharun Bhascker Dhaassyam.

Written by Rahul Ramakrishna.

Cast Abhay Bethiganti(Vishnu). Keshav Deepak(Prashant’s Boss (credit only)). Vijay Deverakonda(Prashanth). Anish Kuruvilla(Businessman). Padmaja Lanka(Prashant’s Mother). Gururaj Manepalli(Chitra’s Father). Priyadarshi Pulikonda(Kaushik). Kedar Shankar(Prashant’s Father). Sawkar Siddhanth(Chef Varun (Siddhanth Sawkar)). Sujatha(Chitra’s Mother). Ritu Varma(Chitra)

Language Telugu.

Producers Raj Kandukuri. Ranjith Kumar. Yash Rangineni.

Production Dharmapath Creations. Big Ben Cinema. Vinoothna Geetha.
